document_data.name: Night Castle
document_data.mainbody: The '''Night Castle''', also known as '''Blacknight Manor''',<ref group="note">While it is not explicitly stated these two names refer to the same location, the fact can both only be found in ''[[The Veiled Dragon]]'' novel and their shared association with the [[Cult of the Dragon]] imply sameness.
document_data.Location: It was situated southeast of the city of [[Elversult]], some ways north of the [[Nameless swamp (Dragon Coast)|nameless swamp]].
document_data.Structure: The Night Castle was once a many-towered fortress before falling to ruin.
document_data.History: During the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]], the [[Maces of Elversult]] repeatedly chased Dragon Cult [[assassin]]s back to the Night Castle, only to have it become shrouded in complete darkness.
document_data.Inhabitants: The ruined castle was the home of [[Indith Shalla]], a [[Shar]]ran leader within the local Dragon cult, as well as a haven of the cell's leader, the [[black dragon|black]] [[Dracolich]] [[Hethcypressarvil]].
